name.ja: ローズチェーン・サルベージ

requirement.en: When your opponent Special Summons a monster while you have a Level 6 or higher Spellcaster Type monster on your field equipped with an Equip Spell Card.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, gain LP equal to [the original Level of the monster Special Summoned by this effect] x 100.
